column4: What'st he command line way to remove something from the boot process?  It has something to d owith init.d, right?
I just installed lighttpd, but I don't want it to boot up because I already have Apache.
the easiest way to mess with init.d stuff is to use sysv-rc-conf
sudo apt-get install sysv-rc-conf then sudo sysv-rc-conf
